title: Manage Pyrotechnics Permit for an Event
description: A touring show plans to use pyrotechnics, and the event manager must secure a permit from the local fire department.

tasks.description: Obtain the detailed pyrotechnics plan from the tour's production manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the plan, including the types of effects and their locations.

tasks.description: Complete the permit application for the local fire department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fills out the required application form.

tasks.description: Submit the application and the pyrotechnics plan to the fire marshal.
Schedule an on-site inspection with the fire marshal for the day of the show.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent coordinates the final inspection to get the permit signed off.
